projects.name: ArtPiece
projects.details: ReactJS, NodeJs, MongoDB, Hugging Face Inference API, Cloundinary
projects.description: Web generate image from text using stabilityai/stable-diffusion-2-1 API, store image into cloudinary and then I keep the image url in MongoDB for querying to show in home page.

projects.name: GameAPI
projects.details: Golang(Jwt, Gorm, Fiber), Docker, PostgreSQL, PgAdmin
projects.description: Developed a REST API for game data management by using GORM for PostgreSQL storage. Integrated JWT token authentication to ensure exclusive access for authorized members.

projects.name: LifeLogHub
projects.description: I created a website that consists of a planner, a to-do list, and diary pages and each page has a function to add, edit, and delete data. Then it will notify users on home page.

projects.name: AnimeBlog
projects.details: ReactJS, MaterialUI, Firebase Database, Firebase Auth, Firebase Storage
projects.description: Web blog about anime that users can register and login to post and comment likes Facebook.

projects.name: AniHub
projects.description: Web template for anime social media consisting of post, chat and profile pages

projects.name: CielBlog
projects.description: Web blog from basic tools like HTML, CSS and VanillaJS.

projects.name: Game Recommendation
projects.description: I trained a model to recommend games based on user's data (playtime, likes, etc.)

activities.name: 1st BorntoDev Dev Init Frontend Camp
activities.details: Camp for developing skills to get into the IT & Dev industry. I have learned from basic to advanced front-end development from creating many websites within the scope of tools that they have limited for each project in 3 months

activities.name: 3rd AI Builders Programs (2022)
activities.details: an 8-week program to learn and create a project about our interest topic of Machine learning or Deep learning and getting instruction from mentors. I made a game recommendation system based on data from Steam by using the neural network embedding method.

activities.name: Thailand Computer Olympiad Camp (2021)
activities.details: Camp for learning competitive programming and algorithms in C and C++. I have learned about algorithms and data structure and how to use them to solve problems in programming contests.
